alert.note: Alert for Northern Dona Ana County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:26PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Dona Ana County through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Jornada Range, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Portions of Jornada Experimental Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
